member.name: T:RobotComponents.Generic.Kinematics.OPWKinematics
member.summary: Represents the OPW Kinematics class.
member.remarks:
Based on the paper 'An Analytical Solution of the Inverse Kinematics Problem of Industrial Serial Manipulators with an Ortho-parallel Basis and a Spherical Wrist' by Mathias Brandst√∂tter, Arthur Angerer, and Michael Hofbaur.
Solution order:
Sol. Wrist center Wrist center Axis 5 angle relative to axis 1 relative to lower arm
0 In front of In front of Positive 1 In front of Behind Positive 2 Behind In front of Positive 3 Behind Behind Positive 4 In front of In front of Negative 5 In front of Behind Negative 6 Behind In front of Negative 7 Behind Behind Negative

member.name: M:RobotComponents.Generic.Kinematics.OPWKinematics.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an empty instance of the OPW Kinematics class

member.name: M:RobotComponents.Generic.Kinematics.OPWKinematics.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.name: M:RobotComponents.Generic.Kinematics.OPWKinematics.UpdateRobotParameters
member.summary: Updates the robot parameters.
member.remarks: Method is called when the property A2 or C3 changes.

member.name: M:RobotComponents.Generic.Kinematics.OPWKinematics.Forward(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double})
member.summary: Calculates the end plane of joint 6 for a given pose.
member.param: The pose as a collection with 6 rotations in radians.
member.returns: The end plane of the 6th joint.

member.name: M:RobotComponents.Generic.Kinematics.OPWKinematics.Forward(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Double},Rhino.Geometry.Point3d@)
member.summary: Calculates the end plane of joint 6 for a given pose.
member.param: The pose as a collection with 6 rotations in radians.
The wrist position for the given pose.
member.returns: The end plane of the 6th joint.

member.name: M:RobotComponents.Generic.Kinematics.OPWKinematics.Inverse(Rhino.Geometry.Plane)
member.summary: Calculates the inverse kinematic solutions.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not the object is valid.

member.name: P:RobotComponents.Generic.Kinematics.OPWKinematics.Solutions
member.summary: Gets the inverse kinematics solutions in radians.

members.member: Gets a value indicating whether or not the solutions have a shoulder singularity. >

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not the solutions have an elbow singularity.

member.name: P:RobotComponents.Generic.Kinematics.OPWKinematics.IsWristSingularity
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether or not the solutions have a wrist singularity.

member.summary: Gets or sets the offset corrections.

member.name: P:RobotComponents.Generic.Kinematics.OPWKinematics.Signs
member.summary: Gets or sets the sign corrections.
member.remarks: This property also checks the input values and adjusts them to -1 or 1 if needed.

member.name: T:RobotComponents.Utils.HelperMethods
member.summary: Represents the class with internal helper methods.

member.name: M:RobotComponents.Utils.HelperMethods.WriteMatrix3x3(Rhino.Geometry.Matrix)
member.summary: Writes a 3x3 matrix to the Rhinoceros command line for debugging purposes.
member.param: The matrix to be written to the command line.

member.name: T:RobotComponents.Utils.MeshPreperation
member.summary: Represents serialization methods

member.name: M:RobotComponents.Utils.MeshPreperation.Repair(Rhino.Geometry.Mesh,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Returns a repaired mesh. Makes a duplicate of the orignal mesh. Heals the naked edges, culls degenerate faces and unifies the normals.
Used for repairing robot and external axes meshes.
member.param: The tolerance for the naked edges.
Indicates whether or not, the mesh should be duplicated first.

member.name: M:RobotComponents.Utils.MeshPreperation.Reduce(Rhino.Geometry.Mesh,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a reduced mesh.
member.remarks: Used for constructing robot and external axis meshes.

member.name: T:RobotComponents.Utils.Serialization
member.summary: Represents serialization methods

member.name: M:RobotComponents.Utils.Serialization.ObjectToByteArray(System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes a common object to a byte array. Typically used for serializing robot meshes and data inside Goo classes.

member.name: M:RobotComponents.Utils.Serialization.ByteArrayToObject(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Deserializes a byte array to a common object. Typically used for deserializing robot meshes and data inside Goo classes.

member.name: T:RobotComponents.VersionNumbering
member.summary: Represents a class that stores the current version number of Robot Components.

member.name: F:RobotComponents.VersionNumbering.CurrentVersion
member.summary: Gets the current version as a string.
member.remarks: Has to be manually updated each time. 0.x.x ---> MAJOR version when you make incompatible API changes x.0.x ---> MINOR version when you add functionality in a backwards compatible manner, x.x.0 ---> BUILD version when you make backwards compatible bug fixes

member.name: F:RobotComponents.VersionNumbering.Version
member.summary: Gets the current version.
member.remarks: Has to be manually updated each time. 0.x.x ---> MAJOR version when you make incompatible API changes x.0.x ---> MINOR version when you add functionality in a backwards compatible manner, x.x.0 ---> BUILD version when you make backwards compatible bug fixes
